game.name: TS Marketplace: FahrBAR Charity Coach Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Enjoy a nice drink and take in stunning scenery on relaxing Swiss rail journeys; the unique and legendary Projekt fahrBAR coach comes to Train Simulator Classic courtesy of Rivet Games!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enjoy a nice drink and take in stunning scenery on relaxing Swiss rail journeys; the unique and legendary Projekt fahrBAR coach comes to Train Simulator Classic courtesy of Rivet Games!
